synopsis.text:
Yoran Pailsen, a former superior, faces the wrath of his abandoned Red Shoulder unit as they join forces with Chirico Cuvie in a quest for vengeance. Set in 1985, this OVA unfolds a crucial chapter between the Uoodo and Kummen arcs of the TV series, offering a deeper insight into Chirico's time with the Red Shoulders and the people involved.

As Chirico continues his relentless pursuit of the elusive Fyana and the mysterious organization holding her captive, a new threat emerges in the form of Ypsilon, a perfect soldier created by Yoran's group. Oblivious to the chaos around him, Ypsilon embarks on a journey to conquer the harsh world through violence.

As the paths of these formidable men intertwine, an explosive confrontation ensues, leading to tragic consequences for all involved. Will Chirico and his allies succeed in their mission, or will Ypsilon's unstoppable power prove to be their downfall? Only time will tell.
